/notes/drc.note1: This is the drc manager config file.
/notes/drc.note1a: The drc page of the ui display will be defined  in /assets/drc/summay
/notes/drc.note1b: The /assets/drc table defines the digital recombiner unit(s), using a template file with placements for selected key words
/notes/drc.note2: The /config/drc area (if present) is still under development
/notes/drc.note3: The /components/drc... tables (if present) define the incoming control words from the pcs system
/notes/drc.note4: The /links/<drc> table  (if present) defines mapping of external interface components to internal variables
/notes/drc.note5: There may be  some junk/test fields as well... they will removed soon
